body_content.explanation: to bring military forces back into an area:
examples: The government is planning to remilitarize the nation's borders.
The country shows little desire to remilitarize and start throwing its weight around.

body_content.explanation: to make a police force similar to a military force again, for example by giving it military weapons:
examples: He denied that there were any plans to remilitarize the police.
Whole areas of the country are out of the government's control, yet few people think the solution is to remilitarize the police.
